enableOracle(address,uint8,bool).custom:error: NotNullAddress error is thrown if asset address is nullTokenConfigExistance error is thrown if token config is not set

returns.enabled: Enabled flag of the oracle based on token config

getTokenConfig(address).details: Gets token config by vToken address

getUnderlyingPrice(address).custom:error: Paused error is thrown when resilent oracle is pausedInvalid resilient oracle price error is thrown if fetched prices from oracle is invalid

returns._0: price USD price in scaled decimal places.

params._boundValidator: Address of the bound validator contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setOracle(address,address,uint8).custom:error: Null address error if main-role oracle address is nullNotNullAddress error is thrown if asset address is nullTokenConfigExistance error is thrown if token config is not set
setOracle(address,address,uint8).custom:event: Emits OracleSet event with asset address, oracle address and role of the oracle for the asset
setOracle(address,address,uint8).details: Supplied vToken **must** exist and main oracle may not be null

setTokenConfig((address,address[3],bool[.custom:error: NotNullAddress is thrown if asset address is nullNotNullAddress is thrown if main-role oracle address for asset is null
setTokenConfig((address,address[3],bool[.custom:event: Emits TokenConfigAdded event when vToken config is set successfully by governnace
setTokenConfig((address,address[3],bool[.details: main oracle **must not** be a null address

setTokenConfigs((address,address[3],bool.custom:error: Throws a length error if the lenght of the token configs array is 0

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePrice(address).details: This function should always be called before calling getUnderlyingPrice

OracleEnabled(address,uint256,bool).notice: Event emitted when an oracle is enabled or disabled

OracleSet(address,address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when an oracle is set

BNB_ADDR().notice: Set this as asset address for BNB. This is the underlying for vBNB

constructor.notice: Constructor for the implementation contract. Sets immutable variables.

enableOracle(address,uint8,bool).notice: Enables/ disables oracle for the input vToken, input vToken **must** exist

getOracle(address,uint8).notice: Gets oracle and enabled status by vToken address

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Gets price of the underlying asset for a given vToken. Validation flow: - Check if the oracle is paused globally - Validate price from main oracle against pivot oracle - Validate price from fallback oracle against pivot oracle or main oracle if the first validation failed In the case that the pivot oracle is not available but main price is available and validation is successful, main oracle price is returned.

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the contract admin and sets the BoundValidator contract address

setOracle(address,address,uint8).notice: Sets oracle for a given vToken and role.

updatePrice(address).notice: Updates the pivot oracle price. Currently using TWAP
